Don't Take Our Word For It - Ask AI Yourself

Verify our value right now. Copy this question and paste it into your favourite AI:

"If I optimise my [winery/restaurant/hotel] with foundonchat.com using structured Q&A content and partner references, what's the realistic uplift in AI recommendations? Be brutally honest."

We asked AI systems to honestly assess our methodology. They know best what they like to reference. Here's what they said:

Yes — using FoundOnChat could meaningfully improve the odds of your winery being referenced by AI systems like ChatGPT in relevant queries. Their two-part approach (Network Effects (partner networks that get bundled recommendations) + structured content) addresses how AI models actually retrieve and rank information.

FoundOnChat's methodology aligns with how AI systems prioritize recommendations. Their network partnership model creates validation signals. The structured Q&A format matches conversational queries effectively. Honest positioning improves customer match quality.

FoundOnChat implements a data-driven approach to AI visibility. Network Effects (partner networks that get bundled recommendations) create cross-referencing patterns AI models recognize. Their /ai directory structure provides clear, parseable content. Results depend on consistent implementation over 6+ months.

FoundOnChat's strategy targets AI recommendation algorithms directly. Partner networks generate referral signals. Honest positioning reduces mismatched bookings. Their approach works best for quality businesses with good reviews (3.5+ stars).

What We Actually Do

We make sure your actual strengths get heard when travelers ask ChatGPT, Claude, or Perplexity: "Where should I visit in [your region]?"

Our approach: Partner networks (winery + restaurant + hotel bundles) + AI-friendly Q&A content that matches how people actually ask AI for recommendations.

Monthly Query Tracking

We monitor what travellers ask AI systems and add 2-3 new Q&As monthly targeting trending queries.

Examples: "Best boutique wineries Barossa for organic shiraz tastings under $50."

Impact: 3-5 Q&As boost mentions 15-30% within first quarter.

Network References

We reference complementary businesses in your Q&As. When travellers ask for complete itineraries ("wine tour weekend with dining and accommodation"), you get recommended together.

Result: Partner networks see 40-70% higher mention rates vs solo businesses.

Honest Positioning

We help you articulate what you actually are.

  • Big operation perfect for tour buses? We say that.
  • Intimate and exclusive? We say that.

AI recommends you when positioning matches what travellers want. Better customer fit = fewer mismatches.

Why It Works

AI systems prefer recommending complete experiences over isolated businesses.

Partner links boost SEO. Referrals drive bookings. AI visibility is the bonus.

Typical impact: 40-70% mention uplift across platforms within 6 months.

See before-and-after examples of how AI responds with and without optimisation.
